column3: This is your cabin.  Your cabinmate still isn't here

column3: This is the hall outside of your cabin
column4: You enter the hall outside of your cabin.  There are shiphands running to various locations.  Everyone seems too focused to talk.  The hallway goes left (Northward) or right (Southward)

column3: This hallway leads to the infirmary or your cabin.  There is a cabin on this corner

column3: This hallway leads to the mess hall or your cabin.  There is a cabin and the showers on this corner
column4: The hallway comes to a corner and leads Eastward to the Mess Hall or Northward to your cabin.  There is a a cabin on the corner to the West.  The showers are are also here Southward

column3: This is the cabin of DeRock and Zandr
column4: This is the cabin of DeRock and Zandr.  They must be on the bridge

column3: The hallway outside the infirmary and mechanical room.  The hallway leads to the cabins or Mess Hall
column4: The hallway comes to a head outside the Infirmary to the North and the Mechanical Room to the South.  The hall continues South to the Mess Hall or West to the cabins

column4: The ship's Mechanical Room.  There are various tools on the walls and shelves.  The ship's electrical systems are here as well

To the North are the Infirmary and Mechanical Room.  To the South are the ship's cabins.  To the West is the Mess Hall.  To the East is the Navigation and Armory|9|0|0|0|0|0|0|1,,,

column3: The ship's showers.  There's no one in here perv

column4: The hallway continues on toward the Drop Pods

column1: 201|Crash Site|This is the crash site|The landing was rough, and that's putting it nicely.  You find yourself in the middle of a strange forest.  There is a clearing to the North which you can see because the Drop Pod took out the trees on the way in|201|0|0|0|0|0|0|2,,,

column12: 2,Valley Clearing,"The clearing opens to reveal a valley, cut by a large stream. There is a path leading Westward to the mountains, Northward to a path along the stream, and an Eastward path into the forest","This is the valley clearing by the drop pod landing site. There is a path leading Westward to the mountains, Northward to a path along the stream, and an Eastward path into the forest"
2,,The path leads up the mountain to the West and back down to the valley in the East,The path leads up the mountain to the West and back down to the valley in the East

2,,"The mountain path winds itself further up the mountain to the North, and back down to the valley to the East","The mountain path winds itself further up the mountain to the North, and back down to the valley to the East"

2,,The mountain path continues from North to South.  You notice that there is a wildlife path heading in the Westward direction,The mountain path continues from North to South.  There is also a wildlife path heading in the West
2,,The path becomes much more difficult to traverse due to the rocks.  You can see a cave up in the distance  to which the path seems to leads,There is a cave at the end of this rocky path
2,,"You enter a dark cave. Clearly a creature of some sort has been living here, but is not here now",The creature cave

2,,The mountain path continues Eastward and begins decending.  There is an overlook to the North and the path winds down to the rocky path to the South,The mountain path runs South to East with an overlook to the North

2,,"The path opens up to a beautiful mountain vista.  There is a town nestled in the valley to the North.  You admire the view.  This planet is strange, but also familiar",A serene town can be seen from this breathtaking mountain view
2,,The mountain path decends Eastward and rises Westward,The mountain path decends Eastward and rises Westward
2,Sewer Entrance,Clearly they were expecting someone to arrive by the road.  The only way into the city to avoid being seen is through the sewers. Enter?,The entrance to the sewers. Enter?
2,Boss Area,"As you enter the sewers, an ROUS (Rodent of Unusual Size) appears",
